2014 Conference date announcement

17th October 2014

Plans are coming together for Northern Lights 2014. Our theme this year is context. We'll be announcing speakers and sponsors over the next few weeks.

Tickets will be available soon, meantime go ahead and book your day of training out of the workplace / classroom in readiness to join us for an exciting day of inspiration as winter approaches.

Keep up to date

Sign up here to join our mailing list, and we'll let you know the minute tickets are released.

You can also follow us on twitter, or get on touch via northern.lights.conf@gmail.com.
